snippet: HOLMAN--Alexander H.,96, passed away peacefully on April 3, 2016. He was born in New York City, and resided in Englewood, NJ and Mill River, MA. Alex was a graduate of New York University, served as a U.S. Army Captain during World War II, and had a long career in the fashion industry. He was passionate about opera and classical music. Alex was active in Public Funds for Public Schools, the ACLU Bergen County chapter, and MD Support-The Eyes of the Macular Degeneration Community. He is survived by his loving and devoted wife, Adele, adoring children Lewis (Mary), Janet (Rick) and Madeline (Neil), and his treasures - grandchildren David (Rommy), Eric (Hayly), Maya, Joanna, Andrew, Julie and Brian, and great-grandchildren Ross and Sisa. Funeral services will be Wednesday, April 6 at 11am at Gutterman and Musicant Jewish Funeral Directors, 402 Park St., Hackensack, NJ. Donations in Alex's memory can be made to MD Support, 3600 Blue Ridge Blvd., Grandview, MO 64030. 1/3
